name: relexp1d

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, crelexp, nat1), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))

comment: A relation composed once is itself. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
